card.name: Natural Snare
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and put it into his mana zone.

card.name: Cocco Lupia
card.text: ■ Your creatures that have Dragon in their race each cost 2 less to summon. ''(Dragonoids don't count.)'' They can't cost less than 2.

card.name: Bazagazeal Dragon
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures. ■ Double Breaker ■ End Step

card.name: Totto Pipicchi
card.text: ■ Each creature in the battle zone that has Dragon in its race has "speed attacker." ''(A creature that has "speed attacker" doesn't get summoning sickness.)''

card.name: Hell's Scrapper
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Destroy any number of your opponent's creatures that have total power 5000 or less.

card.name: Chitta Peloru
card.text: ■ All Dragons in the battle zone can attack untapped creatures.

card.name: Überdragon Valkyrias
card.text: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Armored Dragons. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution Dragon from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Triple breaker

card.name: Geometeus Infinite Dragon
card.text: ■ Whenever this creature attacks your opponent and isn't blocked, you may put a Dragon from your hand into the battle zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Super Dragon Machine Dolzark
card.text: ■ Multi ■ Whenever one of your other creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 5000 or less and put it into his mana zone. ■ Double Breaker

card.name: Magmadragon Balga Geyser
card.text: ■ Power Attacker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it into your graveyard.

card.name: Infinity "Hidden Blade" Dragon
card.text: ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever one of your Dragon creatures is destroyed, you may put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If that card is a Dragon or Samurai creature that costs 7 or less, you may put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Balga Raiser, the Dragonic Meteor
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ Double Breaker ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is a non-evolution Dragon, you may put it into the battle zone.

card.name: Magmadragon Gardos
card.text: ■ Speed Attacker ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ End Step

card.name: Terradragon Balgazarmas
card.text: ■ Whenever one of your creatures that has Dragon in its race attacks, you may reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a Dragon, put it into your hand. If it isn't a Dragon, put it into your mana zone.

card.name: Infinity Dragon
card.text: ■ When one of your Dragons would leave the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your graveyard. If it's a Dragon or a Fire Bird, it stays in the battle zone instead. ■ Double Breaker
